item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 24, 2024 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Evidence of oldest known alphabetic writing unearthed in ancient Syrian city (190 points | 117 comments)
2. Frosted Glass from Games to the Web: HTML glass UI inspired by AAA game dev (105 points | 31 comments)
3. Bocker: Docker implemented in around 100 lines of Bash (2015) (143 points | 51 comments)
4. Ice base melt revealed by multibeam imagery of an Antarctic ice shelf (72 points | 2 comments)
5. Antenna Diodes in the Pentium Processor (164 points | 26 comments)
6. Highest-resolution images ever captured of the sun’s surface (407 points | 113 comments)
7. Continuous Integration Dashboard for Apache NuttX RTOS (Prometheus and Grafana) (50 points | discuss)
8. Supreme Court allows multibillion-dollar class action to proceed against Meta (20 points | 10 comments)
9. Denmark will plant 1B trees and convert 10% of farmland into forest (5 points | discuss)
10. 32k context length text embedding models (25 points | 8 comments)
11. A century later, a taped message solves the mystery of a WWI doughboy's death (43 points | 9 comments)
12. Three hundred words you can spell on a calculator [pdf] (26 points | 10 comments)
13. Anti-scale: a response to AI in journalism (35 points | 26 comments)
14. Size and albedo of the largest detected Oort-cloud object (94 points | 40 comments)
15. A short introduction to Interval Tree Clocks (52 points | 7 comments)
16. Hundreds More Nazca Lines Emerge in Peru's Desert (7 points | 4 comments)
17. Ahmed Mohamed Clock Incident (10 points | 1 comment)
18. 2007 Boston Mooninite Panic (33 points | 17 comments)
19. Rust's Two Kinds of 'Assert' Make for Better Code (6 points | 2 comments)
20. Stack Analyser: detect technologies used inside a repo (34 points | 3 comments)
21. 1 Dataset. 100 Visualizations (65 points | 18 comments)
22. Using GPS in the Year 1565 (154 points | 22 comments)
23. The remarkable life and astonishing times of Dwight Smith Young (26 points | 1 comment)
24. OpenMPTCProuter: Aggregate and encrypt multiple internet connections using MPTCP (140 points | 33 comments)
25. Music as Language (2019) [pdf] (44 points | 6 comments)
26. Quake 3 Source Code Review: Network Model (2012) (283 points | 63 comments)
27. The Physics of Butterfly Wings (44 points | 9 comments)
28. Dear sir, you have built a compiler (2022) (350 points | 193 comments)
29. MaXX Interactive Desktop -- the little brother of the great SGI Desktop on IRIX (145 points | 65 comments)
30. Computer Networking Fundamentals – Learning Series (2023) (153 points | 13 comments)
